testcase.name: To login a valid user credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in BDD Demo Login Page http://promantusbdddemo.azurewebsites.net/Account/Login.passed When User enters username in BDD Demo Promantus.............................passed And user enters password in BDD Demo bdd...................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user should be able to login successfully..............................passed

testcase.name: To make a payment with valid Payment details
testcase.system-out: Given User is in BDD Demo Login Page http://promantusbdddemo1.azurewebsites.net.passed And User enters username in BDD Demo Promantus..............................passed And user enters password in BDD Demo bdd...................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed And user is redirected to paybill page......................................passed And user enters dayofpayment................................................passed And user enters amount......................................................passed And user enters SwiftCode...................................................passed When user clicks on make payment............................................passed And user is redirected to otp page..........................................passed And user enters the otp.....................................................passed And user clicks on submit otp...............................................passed Then user should see the payment successful page............................passed
